component_evaluation module¶

component_evaluation.by_bbox_size(components)¶

returns a list of the components ordered by bbox size

component_evaluation.eliminate_insiders(components)¶

eliminates all components whose bounding boxes lie inside of others. The components object is manipulated in place

component_evaluation.eliminate_tiny(components, threshold_factor=0.2)¶
component_evaluation.filter_neighbors(components, args)¶

eliminates all components that have no neighbors as specified by the corresponding parameters in args. The components object is manipulated in place.

component_evaluation.is_inside(a, b)¶

determines whether the bounding box of component b lies inside that of a

Parameters:
  • a (Component objects) – the outer one
  • b (Component objects) – the inner one
Returns:

Boolean whether bbox of component b lies inside that of component a
